Text:
If you love anything with a twist at the end then of course the master was Roald Dahl as the following television series of his books highlights:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6283094/Tales_of_the_Unexpected__%28Complete_Edition%29

Please do not download Cube (1997).  It is the absolute dumbest movie ever and the remainder of my life is diminished in quality for having been robbed of 90+ minutes of my life.

Please do not make the same mistake or you will regret it.  You've all been warned!
Some-Young-Guy lives up to his name. I disliked Cube but find out for yourself. Some people I know loved it. But don't let your opinion be shaped by some-dumb-internet-kid
